name: Peanut Butter & Jelly Nutrition, Inc.
description: Peanut Butter & Jelly Nutrition, Inc. (PBJN) is an innovative food company dedicated to creating delicious and nutritious snacks that promote healthy eating habits. Founded in 2015, PBJN aims to transform the snack food industry by focusing on natural ingredients and sustainability. The company specializes in a range of nut-based spreads and jelly products that are not only tasty but also packed with essential nutrients. PBJN’s flagship products include organic peanut butter, almond butter, and a variety of fruit spreads made from non-GMO ingredients. With a mission to provide wholesome snacks for families, PBJN emphasizes transparency in its sourcing and production processes, ensuring that every product is crafted with care. The company is committed to sustainability, utilizing eco-friendly packaging and sourcing ingredients from responsible suppliers. In addition to its core product line, PBJN is actively involved in community initiatives, promoting healthy eating through educational programs and partnerships with local schools. As a leader in the healthy snack market, PBJN continuously innovates to meet consumer demands for convenience, taste, and nutrition, making it a go-to choice for health-conscious individuals and families alike.

seo.meta_title: Peanut Butter & Jelly Nutrition, Inc. | Healthy Snacks and Nutritious Spreads
seo.meta_description: Discover Peanut Butter & Jelly Nutrition, Inc., a leader in healthy snacks. Explore our innovative nut spreads and fruit jellies made with natural ingredients.

faq.question: What products does PBJN offer?
faq.answer: PBJN offers a variety of nut spreads and fruit jellies, including organic peanut butter and almond butter.

faq.question: Where is PBJN headquartered?
faq.answer: PBJN is headquartered in Austin, Texas, USA.

faq.question: What is PBJN's mission?
faq.answer: PBJN's mission is to provide delicious and nutritious snacks that promote healthy eating.
